issue.title: [C++][Docs][FlightRPC] Fix Flight SQL static build on windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16128](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16128). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of the c++ code is non std in the flightsql project and does not build with msvc.

There is also undocumented definitions which need to be set during complication when using static builds with flight on windows.
